redwarn.name: Name of RedWarn, translated.
redwarn.signature: This is a link to RedWarn's page on enwiki (WP:RW)
redwarn.userAgent: Unless you know what you are doing, this usually shouldn't be changed, just copy the en-US one.

init.error: Indicates that an error has occurred during initialization

mwChecks.*: A catchall for failed MediaWiki checks
mwChecks.version: Used to inform the user that the MW version is not supported.
mwChecks.user: Used to inform the user that they are not logged in.
